WHAT TYPE OF PROCRASTINATOR ARE YOU?
The Art of Procrastination
YOU ARE

Lowkey Bradley

100% Procrastination

Congratulations, you are Lowkey Bradley! Woah Woah Woah Woah slow down Lowkey Bradley! You are the pro in procrastination! And it is not something to be proud of…. Most of the time, it means you miss deadlines and waste a lot of time. Right now, maybe your head is full of ideas, but when are you going to do that? Fear not, we got your back, and we wanted to help you find the perfect balance in the spectrum of procrastination.

10 Steps to...

Smart Procrastination

Get Out of Your Head

Slight movements will help and reset your mood, such as taking a short walk outside, exercising, can be a way against stress and also has a energizing effects.

Declutter Your Work Area

Clutter can cause distraction and adds up to your stress. So take a minute or two, to clear up your workspace. A cleaner and tidy workspace can elevate the mood to work more efficiently.

Take a Step Back & Meditate

Instead of pushing through, take a pause and breathe. Observe your thoughts, and acknowledge them without judgment.

Write in a Journal

Multiple tasks may make you feel overwhelmed, jot down and prioritise the tasks you need to get done. Planning your day can help you feel less overwhelmed.

Do Something Creative

If you are constantly postponing the tasks you need to get done, use the time to explore your creativity. Research shows that doing creative things can help lower stress levels and promote relaxation.

Make Your Temptations More Inconvenient

Placing obstacles between ourselves and our temptations to induce a certain degree of inconvenience can help with lessening Procrastination. For e.g. placing your phone to a drawer and award yourself with it, when your tasks is done.

Next Action Habit

Thinking of the next action can create a layer of self-deception. Motivation follows action, get started and you’ll find your motivation follows.

Think about the Future

You can lessen procrastination when you can imagine what the your future self would feel if you procrastinate. Most people would feel regret and guilt if they had procrastinate more.

Build Momentum

Try to build momentum when working, hence your working cycle won’t get easily broken off by distractions.

Seek Help From Others

Ask assistance from others (e.g. family or friends) if you get stuck. Even telling another person can help you to become more accountable.

Other Procrastinators Type

Steady Randy

Steady Randy is a person who finished their objectives effectively while doing a little procrastination

Serenity Lily

Serenity Lily is someone who can figure out their portion of work and procrastination calmly

Millie Mild

Millie Mild are wise when it comes to deciding whether they will be working or procrastinating

Chill Bill

Chill Bill is someone who finished their tasks, but seem to have little difficulty to stop their procrastination
